DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect high-calorie high-fat meal extent rate absorption CHF 5074 single oral administration young healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Effects Food Ingestion Pharmacokinetics CHF 5074 Healthy Young Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Subject judge good health basis medical history , complete physical examination include vital sign , 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) standard laboratory test . Subject body mass index 18 30 kg/m^2 , inclusive . Medical history ( within last 10 year ) major cardiovascular , hepatic renal disease . Abnormal result liver function test , renal function test thyroid test perform screen . Significant allergic condition require medical treatment Use psychoactive , recreational prescription drug within 4 week prior study drug administration . Use ibuprofen , sulindac sulfide , indomethacin , flurbiprofen within 2 week prior study drug administration .
